publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5979Patricia Ferguson:Caldercuilt Youth Forumâ€”That the Parliament notes the successful launch of the Caldercuilt Youth Forum; congratulates all the volunteers responsible for the project but especially Julie Hyslop whose determination and hard work has resulted in more than 90 young people having the opportunity to enjoy safe play in a nurturing atmosphere; recognises the contribution of the parents and families involved and particularly the enthusiasm of the young people themselves, and wishes the forum every success in the future.

S3M-5979 Caldercuilt Youth Forum (lodged on 17 March 2010) Mary Mulligan*, David Stewart*, Pauline McNeill*, Mr Frank McAveety*, James Kelly*, Ken Macintosh*, Helen Eadie*, Jackie Baillie*, Bill Butler*
